description: This Kotlin source file defines an API client using Retrofit for network communication. It includes configuration data classes, functions for creating OkHttp clients with logging and headers, and factory methods to instantiate Retrofit instances with proper configuration handling.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: Singleton object that provides configured Retrofit instances and network configuration utilities.

classes.name: ApiClient.NetworkConfig
classes.description: Data class holding base URLs for various network services, with methods to create configurations based on BuildConfig variables.

methods.name: ApiClient.NetworkConfig.fromBuildConfig
methods.description: Creates a NetworkConfig instance with URLs fetched from BuildConfig fields or default placeholders.

methods.name: ApiClient.NetworkConfig.isMissingOrPlaceholder
methods.description: Checks if any of the base URLs are missing or set to a placeholder, indicating mock usage.

methods.name: baseOkHttpClient
methods.description: Constructs and returns an OkHttpClient with headers and logging interceptors, with configured timeouts.

methods.name: retrofit
methods.description: Builds and returns a Retrofit instance configured with the specified base URL, okhttp client, and Gson converter.

methods.name: String.ensureTrailingSlash
methods.description: Extension function to ensure the URL string ends with a slash.
